### IncludeColors

>  IncludeColors (colors:list=None, append:bool=True)

*Include additional colors that will be available via Tailwind utility
classes on the page*

<table>
<colgroup>
<col style="width: 6%" />
<col style="width: 25%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
</colgroup>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>colors</td>
<td>list</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>Additional Tailwind color names to include (e.g., [‘red-500’,
‘blue-300’])</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>append</td>
<td>bool</td>
<td>True</td>
<td>Append to default theme colors; set <code>False</code> to replace
all defaults</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L43"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### mk_previewer

>  mk_previewer (app=None, hdrs=None, cls:str='max-w-lg')

*Create a previewer function for rendering FastHTML components in
iframes*

<table>
<colgroup>
<col style="width: 6%" />
<col style="width: 25%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
</colgroup>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>app</td>
<td>NoneType</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>FastHTML app instance; defaults to app with fh_swiftui_hdrs</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>hdrs</td>
<td>NoneType</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>Custom headers (unused, kept for API compatibility)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>cls</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>max-w-lg</td>
<td>Tailwind max-width class (e.g., ‘max-w-sm’, ‘max-w-xl’,
‘max-w-2xl’)</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

Note: mk_previewer is derived from:
[ghdaisy](https://answerdotai.github.io/fhdaisy/core.html#mk_previewer)

``` python
p = mk_previewer()
```

``` python
c = Button("hello", cls="btn")
p(c)
```

    }

        let frame = this;
        window.addEventListener('message', function(e) {
            if (e.source !== frame.contentWindow) return; // Only proceed if the message is from this iframe
            if (e.data.height) frame.style.height = (e.data.height+1) + 'px';
        }, false);
    }" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; display-capture; encrypted-media; fullscreen; gamepad; geolocation; gyroscope; hid; identity-credentials-get; idle-detection; magnetometer; microphone; midi; payment; picture-in-picture; publickey-credentials-get; screen-wake-lock; serial; usb; web-share; xr-spatial-tracking"></iframe>

### FT.padding

>  FT.padding (all=None, **kw)

*Add padding around the content within the element’s bounds. Defaults to
p-4 if no arguments provided.*

<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>all</td>
<td>NoneType</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>equal padding on all sides</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>kw</td>
<td>VAR_KEYWORD</td>
<td></td>
<td></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
# Test with different padding options
p(Div("Default", cls="bg-blue-200").padding())
```

#### .margin

<a

target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### FT.margin

>  FT.margin (all=None, **kw)

*Add margin (space outside) to the element. Defaults to m-4 if no
arguments provided.*

<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>all</td>
<td>NoneType</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>equal margins on all sides</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>kw</td>
<td>VAR_KEYWORD</td>
<td></td>
<td></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
# Default margin
p(Div("Default", cls="bg-blue-200").margin())
```

#### .border

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L96"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### FT.border

>  FT.border (width:int=None, color:str=None)

*Add a border around the element with optional width and color
customization*

<table>
<colgroup>
<col style="width: 6%" />
<col style="width: 25%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
</colgroup>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>width</td>
<td>int</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>Border width as integer (0, 2, 4, 8, etc.) producing border-<width>
class</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>color</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>Border color without ‘border-’ prefix (e.g., ‘primary’, ‘muted’,
‘gray-300’)</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
p(Div("Test").border())
```

#### .corner_radius

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L109"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### FT.corner_radius

>  FT.corner_radius (size:str=None)

*Round the corners of this element. Defaults to ‘rounded’ (base radius)
if no size provided.*

<table>
<colgroup>
<col style="width: 6%" />
<col style="width: 25%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
</colgroup>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>size</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>Tailwind size suffix: ‘xs’, ‘sm’, ‘md’, ‘lg’, ‘xl’, ‘2xl’, ‘3xl’,
‘4xl’, ‘none’, ‘full’, or ‘[<custom>]’</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
# Default rounded
p(Div("Default", cls="bg-blue-200 p-4").corner_radius())
```

    }" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; display-capture; encrypted-media; fullscreen; gamepad; geolocation; gyroscope; hid; identity-credentials-get; idle-detection; magnetometer; microphone; midi; payment; picture-in-picture; publickey-credentials-get; screen-wake-lock; serial; usb; web-share; xr-spatial-tracking"></iframe> 

``` python
# Specific sizes
p(Div("Small", cls="bg-green-200 p-4").corner_radius("sm"))
```

#### Color

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L119"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### Color

>  Color (hue, weight=None)

*Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.*

#### .fg/.bg

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L152"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### FT.bg

>  FT.bg (c)

*Set background color*

<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>c</td>
<td>A color object or a tailwind color (e.g. red-500)</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L144"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### FT.fg

>  FT.fg (c)

*Set foreground/text color*

<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>c</td>
<td>A color object or a tailwind color (e.g. red-500)</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
Div("Hello").fg(Color.Primary)
```

``` html
<div class="text-gray-900">Hello</div>
```

``` python
Div("Error!").fg(Color.Danger).bg(Color.Muted)
```

``` html
<div class="text-red-600 bg-gray-300">Error!</div>
```

``` python
p(Div("Error!").fg(Color.Danger).bg(Color.Muted))
```

&lt;script&gt;
    function sendmsg() {
        window.parent.postMessage({height: document.documentElement.offsetHeight}, &#x27;*&#x27;);
    }
    window.onload = function() {
        sendmsg();
        document.body.addEventListener(&#x27;htmx:afterSettle&#x27;,    sendmsg);
        document.body.addEventListener(&#x27;htmx:wsAfterMessage&#x27;, sendmsg);
    };&lt;/script&gt;   &lt;/head&gt;
   &lt;body&gt;
     &lt;div class=&quot;max-w-lg &quot;&gt;
       &lt;div class=&quot;text-red-600 bg-gray-300&quot;&gt;Error!&lt;/div&gt;
     &lt;/div&gt;
   &lt;/body&gt;

        let frame = this;
        window.addEventListener('message', function(e) {
            if (e.source !== frame.contentWindow) return; // Only proceed if the message is from this iframe
            if (e.data.height) frame.style.height = (e.data.height+1) + 'px';
        }, false);
    }" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; display-capture; encrypted-media; fullscreen; gamepad; geolocation; gyroscope; hid; identity-credentials-get; idle-detection; magnetometer; microphone; midi; payment; picture-in-picture; publickey-credentials-get; screen-wake-lock; serial; usb; web-share; xr-spatial-tracking"></iframe>

#### .shadow

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L161"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### FT.shadow

>  FT.shadow (**kw)

*Add shadow to element. Use ‘size’ for presets, or
‘x’/‘y’/‘blur’/‘spread’/‘color’ for custom shadows.*

``` python
# Default shadow
p(Button("Default Shadow", cls="btn btn-primary").shadow())
```

<iframe srcdoc=" &lt;!doctype html&gt;
 &lt;html&gt;
   &lt;head&gt;
     &lt;title&gt;FastHTML page&lt;/title&gt;

#### .opacity

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L174"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### FT.opacity

>  FT.opacity (pct:int=100)

*Set element opacity using Tailwind opacity-<pct> utility class*

<table>
<colgroup>
<col style="width: 6%" />
<col style="width: 25%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
</colgroup>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>pct</td>
<td>int</td>
<td>100</td>
<td>Opacity percentage (0, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, …, 95, 100, or
‘[<custom>]’ as string)</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
p(Div("Full opacity (default)", cls="bg-blue-500 p-4 text-white").opacity())
```

text-foreground text-destructive text-ring text-input text-border border-primary border-secondary border-accent border-muted border-card border-popover border-primary-foreground border-secondary-foreground border-accent-foreground border-muted-foreground border-card-foreground border-popover-foreground border-background border-foreground border-destructive border-ring border-input border-border&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;script&gt;
    function sendmsg() {
        window.parent.postMessage({height: document.documentElement.offsetHeight}, &#x27;*&#x27;);
    }
    window.onload = function() {
        sendmsg();
        document.body.addEventListener(&#x27;htmx:afterSettle&#x27;,    sendmsg);
        document.body.addEventListener(&#x27;htmx:wsAfterMessage&#x27;, sendmsg);
    };&lt;/script&gt;   &lt;/head&gt;
   &lt;body&gt;
     &lt;div class=&quot;max-w-lg &quot;&gt;
       &lt;div class=&quot;bg-blue-500 p-4 text-white opacity-100&quot;&gt;Full opacity (default)&lt;/div&gt;
     &lt;/div&gt;
   &lt;/body&gt;
 &lt;/html&gt;
" style="width: 100%; height: auto; border: none;" onload="{
        let frame = this;
        window.addEventListener('message', function(e) {
            if (e.source !== frame.contentWindow) return; // Only proceed if the message is from this iframe
            if (e.data.height) frame.style.height = (e.data.height+1) + 'px';
        }, false);
    }" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; display-capture; encrypted-media; fullscreen; gamepad; geolocation; gyroscope; hid; identity-credentials-get; idle-detection; magnetometer; microphone; midi; payment; picture-in-picture; publickey-credentials-get; screen-wake-lock; serial; usb; web-share; xr-spatial-tracking"></iframe>

#### .frame

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L183"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### FT.frame

>  FT.frame (w=None, h=None, halign:str='center', valign:str='center')

*Position this element within a flex frame with optional sizing and
alignment*

<table>
<colgroup>
<col style="width: 6%" />
<col style="width: 25%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
</colgroup>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>w</td>
<td>NoneType</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>Frame width: number (0-96), container size (xs-7xl), ‘full’,
‘screen’, ‘auto’, fraction, or ‘[<custom>]’</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>h</td>
<td>NoneType</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>Frame height: number (0-96), container size (xs-7xl), ‘full’,
‘screen’, ‘auto’, fraction, or ‘[<custom>]’</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>halign</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>center</td>
<td>Horizontal alignment: ‘leading’, ‘center’, ‘trailing’</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>valign</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>center</td>
<td>Vertical alignment: ‘top’, ‘center’, ‘bottom’</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
# Basic frame with size
p(Div("Content", cls="bg-blue-200 p-2").frame(w=64, h=32))
```

### FT.font

>  FT.font (f:__main__.Font)

## Text input and Output

#### Text

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L223"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### Text

>  Text (s:str)

*this draws a string in your app’s user interface using a body font*

<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>s</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>the text string to display</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

#### TextField

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L230"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### TextField

>  TextField (name:str, placeholder:str=None, **kw)

*displays an editable text field*

<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>name</td>
<td>str</td>
<td></td>
<td>the name of the input field</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>placeholder</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>placeholder for this</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>kw</td>
<td>VAR_KEYWORD</td>
<td></td>
<td></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
p(TextField("username", placeholder="Enter your name"))
```

        window.parent.postMessage({height: document.documentElement.offsetHeight}, &#x27;*&#x27;);
    }
    window.onload = function() {
        sendmsg();
        document.body.addEventListener(&#x27;htmx:afterSettle&#x27;,    sendmsg);
        document.body.addEventListener(&#x27;htmx:wsAfterMessage&#x27;, sendmsg);
    };&lt;/script&gt;   &lt;/head&gt;

#### HStack

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L244"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### HStack

>  HStack (*c, spacing=2, alignment='start')

*Arrange child elements horizontally in a row with configurable spacing
and vertical alignment*

<table>
<colgroup>
<col style="width: 6%" />
<col style="width: 25%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
</colgroup>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>c</td>
<td>VAR_POSITIONAL</td>
<td></td>
<td>Child elements to arrange horizontally</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing</td>
<td>int</td>
<td>2</td>
<td>Gap between items (Tailwind spacing: 0, 0.5, 1, …, 96, px, or
‘[<custom>]’)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>alignment</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>start</td>
<td>Vertical alignment: ‘start’, ‘end’, ‘center’, ‘baseline’,
‘stretch’</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
p(HStack(
    Div("Item 1").bg("blue-200").padding(),
    Div("Item 2").bg("green-200").padding(),
    Div("Item 3").bg("red-200").padding()
))
```

            if (e.data.height) frame.style.height = (e.data.height+1) + 'px';
        }, false);
    }" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; display-capture; encrypted-media; fullscreen; gamepad; geolocation; gyroscope; hid; identity-credentials-get; idle-detection; magnetometer; microphone; midi; payment; picture-in-picture; publickey-credentials-get; screen-wake-lock; serial; usb; web-share; xr-spatial-tracking"></iframe> 

#### VStack

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L254"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### VStack

>  VStack (*c, spacing=2, alignment='start')

*Arrange child elements vertically in a column with configurable spacing
and horizontal alignment*

<table>
<colgroup>
<col style="width: 6%" />
<col style="width: 25%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
</colgroup>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>c</td>
<td>VAR_POSITIONAL</td>
<td></td>
<td>Child elements to arrange vertically</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing</td>
<td>int</td>
<td>2</td>
<td>Gap between items (Tailwind spacing: 0, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, …, 96, px,
or ‘[<custom>]’)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>alignment</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>start</td>
<td>Cross-axis alignment: ‘start’, ‘end’, ‘center’, ‘baseline’,
‘stretch’</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
p(VStack(
    Div("Item 1").bg("blue-200").padding(all=2),
    Div("Item 2").bg("green-200").padding(all=2),
    Div("Item 3").bg("red-200").padding(all=2)
))
```

#### Spacer

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L264"

### Spacer

>  Spacer ()

*A flexible space that expands along the major axis of its containing
stack layout*

``` python
p(HStack(
    Div("Left").bg("blue-200").padding(all=2),
    Spacer(),
    Div("Right").bg("green-200").padding(all=2)
).append_classes("w-full"))
```

### HDivider

>  HDivider ()

*A horizontal line that visually separates content within a vertical
stack layout*

``` python
p(VStack(
    Div("Above divider").bg("blue-200").padding(all=2),
    HDivider(),
    Div("Below divider").bg("green-200").padding(all=2)
))
```

#### VDivider

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/thechandru/fhswiftui/blob/main/fhswiftui/core.py#L275"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### VDivider

>  VDivider (color:str='muted')

*A vertical line that visually separates content within a horizontal
stack layout*

<table>
<colgroup>
<col style="width: 6%" />
<col style="width: 25%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
<col style="width: 34%" />
</colgroup>
<thead>
<tr>
<th></th>
<th><strong>Type</strong></th>
<th><strong>Default</strong></th>
<th><strong>Details</strong></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>color</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>muted</td>
<td>Border color without ‘border-l-’ prefix (e.g., ‘muted’, ‘gray-300’,
‘blue-500’)</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

``` python
p(HStack(
    Div("Left").bg("blue-200").padding(all=2),
    VDivider(),
    Div("Right").bg("green-200").padding(all=2)
))
```
